original_text: And when they had come up to Mysia, they attempted to go into Bithynia, but the Spirit of Jesus did not allow them.
korean_text: 무시아 앞에 이르러 비두니아로 가고자 애쓰되 예수의 영이 허락하지 아니하시는지라

sentences.original_text: And when they had come up to Mysia
they attempted to go into Bithynia
but the Spirit of Jesus did not allow them.
